channel.title: Anyone mind helping?
channel.description:
Can anyone please help me out and provide a code for a "world shop". I want it so its a command, and also is a shop for all the players to buy and sell stuff. I've seen these before. =). Also, Could anyone help me with the set up of a "Chillzone"? I can add the x and y variables where needed.
Thanks

item.title: Anyone mind helping?
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Wait, a what?

You mean you want to add a specific area? If so; simple!

if (command.startsWith("chillzone")) {
   teleportToX = //Your X coord goes here
   teleportToY = //Your Y coord goes here
   }

Btw if the code above doesn’t work, change the teleportToX to “toX” and change the teleportToY to “toY.”

A world shop?
So pretty much you want it so if a player types ::shop or ::worldshop, it opens a shop?
I can do that, but I can’t read your mind of getting the knowledge to know what ‘specific’ shop you want, here’s an example:

First you need to declare the INT of wanneshop ( MAKE SURE YOU SEARCH FOR PRIVATE INT WANNESHOP = 0; FIRST INCASE IT’S ALREADY THERE!!!

private int WanneShop = 0; (put that somewhere in your client.java)
Next write out this code:

if (command.startsWith("shop")) {
WanneShop = 1;
}

If none of the if (commands.startsWith("")) works try deleting the space between “if” and “(command”

Hope I helped =)

Read full topic
